tool_description: This API generates true random numbers (not algorithm based) for use in lottery tickets. It also allows Odd/Even checks, and Sum checks (with divergence limits) to further increase selection odds (based on historical data from  millions of past winning numbers).
name: Lotto Ticket Numbers Generator
title: Lotto Ticket Numbers Generator

api_list.name: NumberSets
api_list.description: generates number sets for lottery tickets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-ticket-numbers-generator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-ticket-numbers-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lotto-ticket-numbers-generator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lotto-ticket-numbers-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
